sentence.Network_en: The boy first showed promise as an athlete in grade school.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个男孩在上小学的时候就初次显示出成为运动员的潜力。

sentence.Network_en: The new shopping centre was constructed at a cost of 1.1 million.
sentence.Network_cn: 新建成的购物中心耗资110万。

sentence.Network_en: It was a good table too, sturdily constructed of elm.
sentence.Network_cn: 这也是张很不错的桌子，榆木的，很结实。

this is not construction grade wood ., 这不是建筑级木材.
